english.segment1: After all. You really stink it up. And the lies that you tell. I really think that you know
english.segment2: Left your girl and you left your family too. Things that you're never sure about. Just know that there's one thing I'll get through
english.segment3: You've got it all worked out. I wish you'd shut your mouth
